thread.title: Chelsea news: Antonio Conte was close to 'dramatic divorce' at Chelsea this season | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea news: Antonio Conte was close to 'dramatic divorce' at Chelsea this season | Metro News

author: Chris Davie For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea news: Antonio Conte was close to 'dramatic divorce' at Chelsea this season | Metro News
text:
Antonio Conte came close to ‘dramatic divorce’ at Chelsea this season gossip Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 28 Feb 2017 1:48 pm Antonio Conte came close to leaving Chelsea, according to reports in Italy. (Getty Images) 
Antonio Conte came close to a ‘dramatic divorce’ with Chelsea earlier this season, according to reports in Italy. 
La Gazzetta dello Sport report that in mid-October, the 47-year-old was having a ‘complicated relationship’ with members of Chelsea’s hierarchy, including some of the players at Stamford Bridge. 
It’s claimed that there was ‘indirect’ contact from Inter for Conte as they looked to replace Frank de Boer as their manager. 
But the Serie A club’s approaches were cut short when things began to click for Conte after Chelsea’s 3-0 defeat at the hands of Arsenal. Antonio Conte was wanted by Inter in October. (Getty Images) But Conte’s drastic improvement at Chelsea means he has stayed put. (AMA/Getty Images)
